traits: Worse at night or from heat
History of cancer or autoimmune disease in family

indications: Failure to improve despite well-selected remedies
Always feels cold even in warm weather
used_when: Family history of eczema or scabies

indications: History of suppressed gonorrhea or leucorrhea

used_when: Family history of TB, asthma, allergies

indications: History of cancer, autoimmune or diabetes
Fixed ideas (e.g., soul separated from body)
Nux for acute stress, irritability, indigestion
Sulphur for chronic lazy, philosophical type with skin issues
Psorinum for deep-seated psoric miasm, hopelessness
used_when: Recurrent complaints relapsing after acute relief
Personality and skin suggest psoric block

indications: Pulsatilla for mild, weepy, changeable acute symptoms
Silicea for chronic weakness, chilliness, obstinacy
Tuberculinum for inherited TB miasm, restlessness
Ignatia for acute grief or emotional trauma
Nat mur for reserved, long-standing emotional hurt
Carcinosin for suppressed emotions, perfectionism, family cancer hx
used_when: No physical pathology but mental tension

indications: Belladonna for acute inflammation, sudden onset
Mercurius for destructive tendencies, glandular swellings
Syphilinum for deep syphilitic miasm, ulcers, despair
used_when: Case deteriorates into ulceration or mental collapse

indications: Thuja for post-vaccination effects, fixed ideas
Medorrhinum for inherited sycosis, hormonal & emotional extremes
Nat mur to stabilize emotional trauma layer

relation_notes: Belladonna: Acute congestion, sudden onset, throbbing pain
Mercurius: Chronic inflammation, glandular issues, foul discharges
Useful transition in cases with recurring tonsillitis, abscesses, or otitis
Bryonia: Acute dryness, stitching pain, worse motion
Nat mur: Chronic emotional suppression, headaches, dryness
Common in post-fever dryness, grief-linked illnesses
Aconite: Sudden shock, fear, fever with anxiety
Sulphur: Chronic psoric base, heat, skin issues, mental philosophy
Used in transition from acute panic to long-term psoric state
Gelsemium: Weakness, dullness, trembling with anxiety
Phos acid: Chronic exhaustion, indifference after grief or study
Often follows flu, exams, or long anxiety episodes
Chamomilla: Irritability, colic, teething pains
Staphysagria: Chronic suppressed anger, ailments from humiliation
Transition from acute irritability to long-term emotional suppression
Nux: Acute gastric disturbances, irritability, overstimulation
Sulphur: Chronic lazy yet intellectual profile, skin, heat, and aversion to bathing
Nux often precedes Sulphur in layer removal
Pulsatilla: Weepy, mild, changeable complaints
Silicea: Deep-seated weakness, poor assimilation, obstinacy
Helpful in chronic cases with repeated colds and weak immunity
Rhus tox: Acute stiffness, sprains, better motion
Calc carb: Deep constitutional sluggishness, chilliness, sweat, fear
Often used in arthritis with deeper calc constitutional traits
Arsenicum: Acute restlessness, anxiety, burning pains
Thuja: Chronic sycotic tendencies, fixed ideas, warts
Transition seen in chronic suppressed or post-vaccine states
Hepar: Acute sensitivity, suppuration tendency
Silicea: Chronic weak immunity, pus, cold intolerance
Sequence in chronic abscess or post-infection stages
